4422.verse: لَآ|(There is) no|106|117|30$إِلَـٰهَ|god|53|74|2266$إِلَّا|except|65|86|86$هُوَ|Him;|49|70|298$يُحْىِۦ|He gives life|100|121|2306$وَيُمِيتُ‌ۖ|and causes death,|143|164|2307$رَبُّكُمْ|your Lord|82|93|3243$وَرَبُّ|and (the) Lord|116|202|12356$ءَابَآئِكُمُ|(of) your fathers|131|303|15576$ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ|the former.|94|180|5507$

4417.verse: Indeed, We sent it down during a blessed night. Indeed, We were to warn [mankind].

4418.verse: On that night is made distinct every precise matter -

4419.verse: [Every] matter [proceeding] from Us. Indeed, We were to send [a messenger]

4420.verse: As mercy from your Lord. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.

4421.verse: Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them, if you would be certain.

4422.verse: There is no deity except Him; He gives life and causes death. [He is] your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers.

4423.verse: But they are in doubt, amusing themselves.

4424.verse: Then watch for the Day when the sky will bring a visible smoke.

4425.verse: Covering the people; this is a painful torment.

4426.verse: [They will say], "Our Lord, remove from us the torment; indeed, we are believers."

4427.verse: How will there be for them a reminder [at that time]? And there had come to them a clear Messenger.

4428.verse: Then they turned away from him and said, "[He was] taught [and is] a madman."

4429.verse: Indeed, We will remove the torment for a little. Indeed, you [disbelievers] will return [to disbelief].

4430.verse: The Day We will strike with the greatest assault, indeed, We will take retribution.

4431.verse: And We had already tried before them the people of Pharaoh, and there came to them a noble messenger,

4432.verse: [Saying], "Render to me the servants of Allah. Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger,"
